title: HoMM5_cursors_mod_1.00_to_1.06_or_1.06_to_1.00 [B.Tibor]
description:
Heroes of Might and Magic V  --  Cursors mod 1.00 to 1.06 / 1.06 to 1.00

(EN) English installing instruction

1. Chose witch version's cursors you want to use.
2. Copy the "hwcursors" folder witch you can find in the version number named folder 
   and copy it to "C:...Heroes of Might and Magic V" folder and write over the 
   current cursors.
3. Enjoy the older/newer cursors.

   (You will find this description in the "Read me.txt" file.)
